alert.note: Alert for Clark; Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 01 at 11:38PM PDT until September 02 at 1:30AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM PDT SATURDAY FOR SOUTHEASTERN NYE AND NORTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 1138 PM PDT, Flash flooding from earlier heavy rainfall continues to make roads impassable in Red Rock Canyon and on Highway 95 between Paiute Way and Lee Canyon Road. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... State Route 159 in Red Rock Canyon and Highway 95 between Paiute Way and Lee Canyon Road. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
